ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hello everyone
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Mike and welcome! there is a group or list (I haven t done much with it lately) but it s something like Everquest Meetup (http://everquest.meetup.com/ I
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Mike and welcome!

there is a group or list (I haven't done much with it lately) but it's something like Everquest Meetup (http://everquest.meetup.com/ I believethats the URL)

So give us a little more info, What server, whats your current toon, act.

I play on the Bristlebane server and have a Ranger (Main), mage, Druid, Cleric, Warrior and Beast Lord. Main's in her 50's and the others are 22 - 30.

(Thinking about it, if i could log all of them on at once I'd have a heck of a group!) LOL

Durgaa
